job.title: Payroll & Benefits Administrator
job.description: ltpgtRequisition  1125ltpgtltpgtPOSITION TITLE Payroll and Benefits Administrator  This is not an entirely remote position but Hired offers a hybrid schedule working from home and officeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHiring Wage 2450  2550 per hourltpgtltpgtFull TimeltpgtltpgtHired OverviewltpgtltpgtAt Hired we believe every person is one good job away from a stable and promising future We specialize in supporting individuals whose opportunities have been shaped by historic and systemic inequities We strive to provide coaching and skillbuilding opportunities at every step of their journey while helping individuals stabilize by meeting their basic needs and navigating systems of support Through the culmination of these efforts we believe will ultimately enable them to provide for their families advance in their career and pursue their purposeltpgtltpgtWe look for these skills in a talented individual to join our team and strive to cultivate an environment that harnesses the collective power of these values and experiences each team member brings in pursuit of Hireds mission and values Hires mission isampnbspltemgtto nurture purpose and advance economic opportunity for all through individualized employment and career servicesltemgtampnbspOur values includeampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtPutting People FirstltligtltligtGoing the Extra MileampnbspltligtltligtAdvancing EquityltligtltligtWorking TogetherltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtPOSITION DESCRIPTIONPRIMARY OBJECTIVEampnbspltpgtltpgtHIRED is seeking a Payroll and Benefits AdministratorampnbspHired payroll is processed using ADP Time and Attendance and PayrollampnbspPrevious experience with ADP Workforce Now is desirable This person will work in partnership with the HR Director and Accounting TeamampnbspHired offers a partial schedule working from home and the officeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCORE RESPONSIBILITIESampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPayrollltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze prepare and input payroll dataampnbspUse payroll and time ampamp attendance systems to produce accurate and timely payroll including garnishments child support direct deposit retirement plan misc deductions and tax withholding updatesltligtltligtEnsure accurate payroll and benefit processingltligtltligtMaintain uptodate labor allocations in payroll systemltligtltligtCreate and process journal entries for payroll payroll and vacation accrualsltligtltligtMaintain current knowledge of and ensure compliance with all applicable state and federal wage lawsltligtltligtResolve payroll problems respond to inquiries and enforce payroll policiesltligtltligtProcess and manage W2 reporting and review quarterly tax returns for accuracyltligtltligtComplete account reconciliations for payroll and benefit liability accountsltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspPayroll processing for Program InternsltpgtltulgtltligtSet up interns in ADP for payroll processingltligtltligtProcess I9s for new internsltligtltligtPrepare MN Wage NoticeampnbspltligtltligtReceive paper timesheets for interns and process payrollltligtltligtCoordinate delivery options with front desk and Youth counselorsltligtltligtSet up sick and safe accrual in ADPltligtltligtPrepare monthly intern billing report for Youth Program Director and accountingltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspBenefits AdministrationltpgtltulgtltligtProcess benefit enrollments changes and terminationsltligtltligtEnsure timely communication is sent to third party COBRA administratorampnbspltligtltligtCommunicate with 401K vendor and ensure timely remittance of employee and employer contributionsltligtltligtRun ADP reports to reconcile monthly benefit invoices prior to sending to accounts payable for paymentltligtltligtPartner with HR Director during open enrollments  Update benefit changes and set up open enrollmentltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspHR and Administrative SupportltpgtltulgtltligtAdminister parking and office access cards for North Loop OfficeltligtltligtProcess background checks and I9s for new hiresltligtltligtConduct new hire orientation in absence of HR DirectorltligtltligtTrain new hires in ADP timesheet entries and paid time off requestsltligtltligtSet up and maintain personnel files for new hiresampnbspltligtltligtPeriodically cover for front desk receptionist as neededltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAll Hired employees must carry out their responsibilities in the spirit of equity and inclusion and to actively participate in intercultural development trainings and eventsampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspMinimum RequirementsltpgtltolgtltligtTwo years postsecondary education and three years experience with payroll administration and managementampnbspltligtltligtEfficient organizational and planning skillsltligtltligtEffective time management and ability to prioritize workampnbspltligtltligtExcellent customer serviceltligtltligtSkill in written and oral communicationltligtltligtAbility to work effectively with othersltligtltligtAbility and willingness to respond constructively to rapid changeltligtltligtComputer proficiency especially in Excel and OutlookltligtltolgtltpgtampnbspPreferred ExperienceCredentialsltpgtltolgtltligtPrevious experience processing payroll in ADP Workforce NowampnbspltligtltligtCertified Payroll Profession CPPampnbspltligtltligtKnowledge of grantfunded payrollltligtltolgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtBenefit offerings include Health and Dental Health Savings Account HSA Flexible Spending Accounts FSA Employer Paid Short ampamp LongTerm Disability Insurance Employer Paid Life Insurance Paid Vacation Personal Health and Holidays 401K Retirement Plan with Employer Contribution Voluntary Life Vision and Legal InsuranceampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHired is an Equal Opportunity Employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment without regard to age race color religion national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability or veteran statusampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtApply online atampnbspwwwhiredorgaboutcareersampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
